name: the one and only horse generator
name_original: the one and only horse generator
description:
here it is! the one & only (?) horse generator!

created during pigsquad's summer slow jam. the theme was character creator.

i ran out of time for some of the ideas i wanted to implement, but i still had LOTS of fun making the character creator, and adding two simple tracks to try your creations on. hope you have a bit of fun with it! :)

credits audio

  • carnival rides / Ecrivain / cc0 / opengameart.org
  • mixkit-horse-fast-gallop-in-the-dirt-77 / mixkit license / mixkit.co
visuals
  • animated horse / scratchio / cc0 / opengameart.org
  • generator pics are generated & fetched from thishorsedoesnotexist.com
tools used (all free and open source)
  • godot engine v3.4.4
  • inkscape 1.1.2
  • libresprite 1.0-dev
known issues

apparently there's something that prevents the itch.io version of the game to pull an http request to grab a pic from thathorsedoesnotexist.com. i might try and add a client version to see if that works. but other you can just visit that website in your browser and get inspired for your horse. :P
